mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bt.borrow_nid = bi.borrow_nid
SELECT FORMAT(SUM(bt.account), 2) AS account FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bt.borrow_nid = bi.borrow_nid
SELECT SUM(bt.account) AS account FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid

SELECT bi.borrow_increase_money increase_money, truncate(bi.tender_account_min/10000,2) tender_account_min_wan, bi.contract_period, bi.borrow_extra_yield, bi.borrow_asset_number, bi.borrow_publisher, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN '天' ELSE '个月' END AS borrow_period_type, b.borrow_nid, bi.`name` AS borrow_name, bi.project_name, bi.applicant, b.borrow_user_name AS username, b.user_id AS userId, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_yes, 2) AS borrow_account_yes, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_wait, 2) AS borrow_account_wait, CONCAT(TRUNCATE((b.borrow_account_yes/b.account)*100,2), '%') borrow_account_scale, b.borrow_style, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, b.project_type, bpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, FROM_UNIXTIME( b.reverify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS reverify_time, CASE WHEN ( b.`status` = 0 ) OR ( b.`status` = 0 AND b.verify_status = 0 ) THEN '初审中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 0 AND ( b.verify_status = 1 OR b.verify_status = 3 )) THEN '待发布' WHEN ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.borrow_status = 1 AND b.borrow_account_yes < b.account AND b.verify_time + ( b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW() ) ) THEN '出借中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 1 AND b.reverify_time = '0' AND ( ( b.reverify_status = 0 AND b.borrow_account_yes >= b.account ) OR ( b.verify_time + ( b.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) ) ) THEN '复审中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 0 ) THEN '还款中' WHEN ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.repay_full_status = 1 ) THEN '已还款' WHEN b.`status` = 2 THEN '已流标' ELSE '' END AS `status`, DATE_FORMAT( b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS create_time, CASE WHEN b.borrow_full_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.borrow_full_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS borrow_full_time, CASE WHEN b.recover_last_time <> 0 AND b.recover_last_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_time, CASE WHEN b.recover_last_time <> 0 AND b.recover_last_time IS NOT NULL THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( b.recover_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ELSE '' END AS recover_last_day FROM ht_borrow b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type where b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC, b.id DESC
